about_the_game:
Of Guards and Thieves - Permanent Gold Account includes an In-Game Map Editor to build and share your maps, exclusive 14 Gold Operators Skin, unique 14 new Avatar, Profile Golden Star and 3000 bonus coins.

Content list:

- Golden Star displayed everywhere.
- 3000 Bonus Coins (7.50$ value!)
- 14 exclusive Gold Operators skin.
- In-Game Map Editor.
- Exp gain boost (x1.25) (*applied to everyone inside the server)
- Immediate unlock of all Operators
- 14 exclusive Gold Profile Avatars.

Map Editor Features:

- More than 6000 unique placeable objects
- 100x100 meters editable space
- Up to 7 unique layer editing
- Online loading/saving of maps
- Online multiplayer map editing
- Build your map online with your friends!
- Terrain Textures Painting
- Terrain Details Painting
- 15 Supported Gamemodes


This DLC can only be purchased once per account.
Permanent Gold Account content is exclusive and only available for Permanent Gold Account DLC owner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
